title: Canonical build rules (strict)
gaps: No evidence in AS-IS/SNIPPETS that an `as_is_scan.md` run is enforced/recorded before changes.
No evidence that `requirements_status.md` is populated/maintained with evidence links.
No evidence that this requirements document is being updated with implemented-but-not-documented items per the described process.
notes: AS-IS only confirms the canonical requirements file exists; no enforceable build-rule workflow artifacts were provided in AS-IS/SNIPPETS.

title: Definition of Done (DoD) (strict by default)
gaps: No route: evidence provided (API endpoints list is empty in AS-IS sample).
No db:table.column evidence available (DB scan lists tables but columns are unknown and no file:line mappings were provided).
No test: evidence provided (Tests sample empty).
No ci:workflow evidence provided.
notes: UI pages are present, but DoD requires end-to-end UI→API→DB and tests/CI proof; AS-IS lacks those evidence primitives.

title: Required build artifacts (must be produced by agentic AI)
gaps: No evidence that `as_is_scan.md` exists (only an AS-IS summary was provided in prompt, not a repository file path).
No evidence that `requirements_status.md`, `progress_report.md`, or `implemented_not_documented.md` exist as files in the repo (no file:path evidence in AS-IS/SNIPPETS).
No route:/db:/test:/ci: evidence available to satisfy the described evidence gates.
notes: Cannot mark implemented without concrete repository artifacts; prompt-provided AS-IS summary is not itself file:path evidence of required build artifacts.

title: Production readiness gates (GO / NO-GO) (hard gates)
gaps: No evidence of a gate evaluator script (e.g., `scripts/go-no-go-gates.js`) via file:path.
No ci:workflow evidence showing a GO/NO-GO job that reads `out/k6.json`, `out/chaos.json`, `out/dlq.json` and emits `out/go-no-go.md`.
No evidence of k6/chaos/DLQ artifacts or any enforcement to block deployments.
notes: AS-IS/SNIPPETS contain no CI/workflow/script artifacts for deterministic release gating.

title: Safe deployment automation (canary + rollback) (mandatory)
gaps: No ci:workflow evidence for canary rollout stages (25%→50%→100%).
No evidence of automatic rollback on gate failure.
No evidence of release tagging, runtime config snapshotting, or storing GO/NO-GO report artifact in CI.
notes: No deployment automation evidence was provided in AS-IS/SNIPPETS.
